This vignette illustrates how the points data set works. 

```{r points}
# 
library(points)
points <- list()
data.path <- '~/Dropbox/pkg.data/points'
points$address <- points::address(data.path, fresh=FALSE)
points$shapes <- points::shapes(data.path, fresh=FALSE)
```
